title: Fragment, 1751–1800
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with supplementary discontinuous weft
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Stripes of a dark red silk ribbed weave alternating with stripes of white satin edged with light blue on which a small floral pattern is brocaded.
